dip.gui.order

Class GUIConvoy

  • java.lang.Object
    • dip.order.Order
      • dip.order.Convoy
        • dip.gui.order.GUIConvoy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIOrder, Orderable, java.io.Serializable

    public class GUIConvoy
extends Convoy
implements GUIOrder
    GUIOrder subclass of Convoy order.
    See Also:
